Title: toFloat32
Description: Converts an input value to a value of type Float32. Throws an exception in case of an error.
expr — Expression returning a number or a string representation of a number. Expression.

Values of type (U)Int8/16/32/64/128/256.String representations of (U)Int8/16/32/128/256.Values of type Float32/64, including NaN and Inf.String representations of Float32/64, including NaN and Inf (case-insensitive).
String representations of binary and hexadecimal values, e.g. SELECT toFloat32('0xc0fe');.
